description: Try this chicken schnitzel recipe with a fresh, healthy twist. Served with a side of zingy coleslaw, the whole family can enjoy this nutritionally approved recipe.
name: Healthier Chicken Schnitzel Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, juice lemon halves. Toss apple with half of the juice to avoid browning. Combine remaining juice with 1 tbs water, yoghurt and remaining parsley in a large bowl. Add coleslaw and apple, then toss to combine. Serve schnitzels with slaw, corn and lemon wedges.

Meanwhile, juice lemon halves. Toss apple with half of the juice to avoid browning. Combine remaining juice with 1 tbs water, yoghurt and remaining parsley in a large bowl. Add coleslaw and apple, then toss to combine. Serve schnitzels with slaw, corn and lemon wedges.
